definition[0]: to improve something by changing it slightly or adding a little more to it
example[0]: She quickly touched up her lipstick.
example[1]: The photograph had obviously been touched up.
example[2]: The speech he finally gave had been touched up by his staff.
definition[1]: to touch someone in a sexual way when they do not want you to
example[3]: He was accused of touching up one of his students.
